Entities.Name: Timing References
Entities.Definition: References to the timing of colonoscopy events, often expressed relative to the date of the document or as specific dates.
Entities.Sample Data: "last colonoscopyâ€”5/4/04", "The patient remembers having a colonoscopy five years ago"

Entities.Name: Status Indicators
Entities.Definition: Descriptors indicating the status of colonoscopy events, such as whether they were completed, scheduled, or refused.

Entities.Name: Completed Colonoscopies
Entities.Definition: Specific references to colonoscopies that have been completed, as confirmed by electronic medical records or physician validation.
Entities.Sample Data: "colonoscopy performed last year with no complications"

Dataset.Name: Colonoscopy Testing Records
Dataset.Details: Dataset includes electronic medical records from a random sample of 200 patients aged at least 50, used to identify previous colonoscopy screening using NLP.

Annotation Guidelines.Link: Detailed within the study document; no external link provided. The guidelines cover methods for identifying and annotating timing and status descriptors within EMR text.
